name: markdown-image-bed-by-scp
description: 利用scp上传图床，返回markdown的照片格式，github: https://github.com/mawendaxiong/vsc-plugin-shell_pic_bed

shellPicBed.pic-local-path.markdownDescription:
本地图片存放位置，绝对路径  
Local photo storage path,absolute path  
例子：`/home/foo/markdown/images`

shellPicBed.ssh-key.markdownDescription:
登录服务器的ssh key的**私钥**，请配置一个**不需要输出密码的**私钥  
server ssh key of **private key**, **without password**  
例子：`/home/.ssh/image-key`

shellPicBed.server-user.markdownDescription:
服务器的用户  
server user 
例子：`ubuntu`，`root`

shellPicBed.server-storage-path.markdownDescription:
照片存放到服务器的`绝对路径`  
server image `absolute path`  
例子：`/home/ubuntu/markdown/images`

shellPicBed.server-domain.markdownDescription:
服务域名或者ip，带上`http`或者`https`  
server domain or ip,with `http` or `https`  
例子：`http://192.168.1.1`，`http://foo.com`

shellPicBed.access-image-port.markdownDescription:
http服务器（例如`nginx`）访问端口  
http server(such as `nginx` )  
例子：`8080`，`8090`

shellPicBed.access-image-url.markdownDescription:
http服务器访问照片的路径，末尾记得带上`/`  
http server access image path,end with `/`  
例子：`/my/markdown/pic/`，结合`port`和`domain`，访问url为`http(s)://192.168.1.1:8090/my/markdown/pic/some-image`

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
